name: a user to user failed transaction

steps.name: Given there is user Alice in Ethereum network with no initial balance
And user Alice requests the Ether faucet for <10>Ξ
And there is user Bob in Ethereum network with no initial balance
And user Bob requests the Ether faucet for <10>Ξ
When user Alice sends <11>Ξ to user Bob
Then the recipient has balance increased by 0Ξ
And the sender has balance decreased by 0Ξ
